text: My name is Ariel and I am happy you pressed play today. Maybe you feel shy.
Maybe you feel scared to speak. Maybe your mind says my English is bad. It is okay. You are not alone.
Today I will give you simple, useful, real sentences you can use every day.
You do not need grammar books right now.
You do not need big words. You only need your voice. You only need to listen, pause, and speak with me. We will talk
in English with 100 sentences and more step by step in a soft and easy way.
When you listen, please do not just sit silent. Copy me. Shadow my voice. Repeat my words. This is your speaking time.
You can sit on your bed. You can stand in your room. You can walk slowly in your house. You can close your eyes. But
please speak. That is the most important part. All right. Let us begin with some very simple sentences. Repeat after me.

small city. It is a quiet place. I like my city. I like my street. I like my room. Do you like your city? Yes, I do.

Now let us practice some very common question sentences.

Question: What time do you wake up?
Answer: I wake up at 6:00. I wake up at 7. I wake up late. See, your answers do not need to be long. They only need to be true.

It is sunny. It is cloudy. It is raining. It is cold. It is hot. It is windy. It is nice today. The sun is shining. The sky is blue. The sky is
